metadata.synopsis: Players find the map Ketheric had inside the mausoleum. It shows  the entrance to the Shar Temple (behind Isobel's tomb) and has notes on an attack.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with the map in the Ketheric mausoleum.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Looks like there's a temple under this place - and something deadly sealed inside it.
